articles.description: Hours after Apple gave the social media network an ultimatum to either properly moderate its network or be removed from the App Store, the app is missing from the Google Play Store. The network is preferred by many followers of President Trump and the platfor…
articles.content: It has been a very busy week for social media news! President Trump got permanently banned from Twitter earlier this afternoon after being suspended indefinitely from Facebook and Instagram yesterday… [+1912 chars]

articles.author: Eric Volkman
articles.title: Acacia Communications Cancels Merger With Cisco - Motley Fool
articles.description: The Chinese company cites the lack of timely approval from a regulator as the key reason for the move.
articles.content: On Friday, Acacia Communications(NASDAQ:ACIA) terminated its merger agreement with networking equipment giant Cisco Systems(NASDAQ:CSCO). Acacia said the decision, which was effective immediately, is… [+1546 chars]

articles.title: $300 bonus unemployment checks: Some states now sending payments. What to know - CNET
articles.description: Is your state sending out additional federal unemployment checks? Will you qualify, and how many checks will you get? Here's everything you need to know.
articles.content:
More unemployment checks are on the way. 
Sarah Tew/CNET
